-- Table `mydb`.`User`

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `mydb`.`User` (
  `User_ID` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `Password` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,
  `Email` VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  `Name` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,
  `Phone` VARCHAR(15) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `Admin` TINYINT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  PRIMARY KEY (`User_ID`))
ENGINE = InnoDB;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `mydb`.`Found_Listing` ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `mydb`.`Found_Listing` (
  `Listing_ID` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `User_ID` INT NOT NULL,
  `Type` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,
  `Item_Description` TEXT NOT NULL,
  `Date_Found` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,
  `Location_Found` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,
  `Date_Returned` VARCHAR(45) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `Location_Returned` VARCHAR(45) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `Date_Posted` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,
  `Active` TINYINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
  PRIMARY KEY (`Listing_ID`),
  INDEX `found_posted_by_idx` (`User_ID` ASC) VISIBLE,
  CONSTRAINT `found_posted_by`
    FOREIGN KEY (`User_ID`)
    REFERENCES `mydb`.`User` (`User_ID`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION)
ENGINE = InnoDB;

-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `mydb`.`Image`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `mydb`.`Image` ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `mydb`.`Image` (
  `Image_ID` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `User_ID` INT NOT NULL,
  `Listing_ID` INT NOT NULL,
  `Image_Location` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`Image_ID`),
  INDEX `owner_of_photo_idx` (`User_ID` ASC) VISIBLE,
  INDEX `found_listing_idx` (`Listing_ID` ASC) VISIBLE,
  CONSTRAINT `owner_of_photo`
    FOREIGN KEY (`User_ID`)
    REFERENCES `mydb`.`User` (`User_ID`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION,
  CONSTRAINT `found_listing`
    FOREIGN KEY (`Listing_ID`)
    REFERENCES `mydb`.`Found_Listing` (`Listing_ID`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION,
  CONSTRAINT `lost_listing`
    FOREIGN KEY (`Listing_ID`)
    REFERENCES `mydb`.`Lost_Listing` (`Listing_ID`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION)
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `mydb`.`Closed_Item`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `mydb`.`Closed_Item` ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `mydb`.`Closed_Item` (
  `Closed_ID` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `Listing_ID` INT NOT NULL,
  `Claimant_ID` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `Waiver_Agreed` TINYINT NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`Closed_ID`),
  INDEX `listing_connect_idx` (`Listing_ID` ASC) VISIBLE,
  CONSTRAINT `listing_connect`
    FOREIGN KEY (`Listing_ID`)
    REFERENCES `mydb`.`Found_Listing` (`Listing_ID`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION)
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `mydb`.`Identity_Waiver`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `mydb`.`Identity_Waiver` ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `mydb`.`Identity_Waiver` (
  `User_ID` INT NOT NULL,
  `Closed_ID` INT NOT NULL,
  `Waiver` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`User_ID`, `Closed_ID`),
  INDEX `closed_item_idx` (`Closed_ID` ASC) VISIBLE,
  CONSTRAINT `user_waiver`
    FOREIGN KEY (`User_ID`)
    REFERENCES `mydb`.`User` (`User_ID`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION,
  CONSTRAINT `closed_item`
    FOREIGN KEY (`Closed_ID`)
    REFERENCES `mydb`.`Closed_Item` (`Closed_ID`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION)
ENGINE = InnoDB;

SET FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS=@OLD_FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS;
SET UNIQUE_CHECKS=@OLD_UNIQUE_CHECKS;
